top-description-title: Vote for topics suggested by others, submit your own ideas or become a speaker.
top-description: Give your vote to the topics that you find most interesting. If you'd like to become a speaker yourself, submit your topic and tag it as „call4papers” - we'll be in touch soon to discuss further details. Are you interested in something particular, but don't have enough knowledge about it? Submit your idea along with the tag „to grab”, so that someone with suitable expertise can pick this topic from the list and apply as a speaker - just by clicking on the „to grab” tag.
login-info: To vote or submit your ideas, you need to be logged in.
